definition: to guard against/to exhort/to admonish or warn/to give up or stop doing sth/Buddhist monastic discipline/ring (for a finger)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: The demand for circumcision seems to have caught everybody off guard.
sentences.chinese: 割包皮的要求似乎將每個人都拽回了警戒線內。

sentences.english: Setting data-driven OOT alert limits in such situations may not be possible.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，不可能設置數據驅動的OOT警戒線。

sentences.english: A thousand constables cordoned off the riot area.
sentences.chinese: 示威者衝破了警察的警戒線。

sentences.english: Some police officers beat protesters, and formed minimally effective cordons.
sentences.chinese: 一些警察毆打示威者，並形成了微創有效的警戒線。

sentences.english: Other parts of the city centre were also cordoned off.
sentences.chinese: 倫敦市中心的其他地方也已經被用警戒線圈起來了。

sentences.english: On the other hand, the US cordons China's periphery.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，美國在中國周邊都畫上了警戒線。

sentences.english: How am I to find the perimeter in the dark?
sentences.chinese: 我在黑暗裏怎麼看出周圍的警戒線呢？

sentences.english: Scotland Yard said a cordon was used because missiles were being thrown at officers.
sentences.chinese: 蘇格蘭場說使用警戒線是因爲一直有投擲物扔向警察。

sentences.english: This guy breached security to give his girlfriend a good-bye kiss at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 這個男人在機場越過警戒線，吻別他的女朋友。

sentences.english: Military choppers circle the yard as reinforcements on the ground secure the perimeter.
sentences.chinese: 軍用直升機在院內盤旋，支援部隊在地面佈置警戒線。

sentences.english: Please keep away from the cordoned area.
We must empower a Pacific Rim cordon until China'sbulwark implodes.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須授權一個泛太平洋警戒線，直到中國自爆。

sentences.english: Some of the crowd attempted to break through police cordons .
sentences.chinese: 人羣中有些人試圖突破警察的警戒線。

sentences.english: But others filled bottles with petrol to throw at the police lines.
sentences.chinese: 另外一些人則在瓶子裏灌上汽油投向警察的警戒線。

sentences.english: The police cordoned off the street.
sentences.chinese: 警察用警戒線封鎖街道。

sentences.english: Water level of 80 rivers crosses warning mark .
sentences.chinese: 中國南部80餘條河流水位超警戒線。

definition: (of a stock price or market index) currently higher than at the previous day's close
